name: Blastoise GX
author: sadaji

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rocket Splash
attacks.effect: Shuffle any amount of {W} Energy from your Pokémon into your deck. This attack does 60 damage for each card you shuffled into your deck in this way.

attacks.name: Giant Geyser GX
attacks.effect: Attach any number of {W} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
